message: Anybody knows a good program for recording screencasts?

data.message: I also recommend Camtasia Studio.. Another humble (free) alternative is Windows Media Encoder (ALLAH yer7amo), I think it's name is changed now, but I could send you the good old installer if you need it
I also use a combination of CamStudio and Movie Maker

CamStudio .. free alternative to Camtasia Studio 
http://camstudio.org/

The best is Camtasia Studio. If you are not interested in heavy editing features (e.g. can do with Movie Maker, which works for many people, like Mohamed Hossam, or if you are recording offline events with no editing, which my company has been doing for a while), you can get SnagIt for 1/6 the price (~ $50 instead of ~ $300). For free options, CamStudio seems to be the most common option, although doesn't work nicely with some microphones.
